document.full_text: often criticized by los angeles lakers fans for being a 'ball hog', kobe bryant played the role of facilitator to perfection on wednesday as the nba champions leveled their playoff series with new orleans.
document.title: facilitator bryant eschews scoring as lakers level series
lines_and_colors: often criticized by los angeles lakers fans for being a 'ball hog', kobe bryant played the role of facilitator to perfection on wednesday as the nba champions leveled their playoff series with new orleans.
